description: The magic item cannot be harmed or damaged through non-magical means.
You can use your reaction to redirect a successful attack made to an adjacent target to you instead
Symbols, writing, or a small area of the magic item softly glows, producing dim light for a one foot radius
When you first touch the magic item, you feel a predetermined sensation chosen by it's crafter
The magic item is always clean. dirt, grime, or any sullying material sheds off of the object
The magic item sheds dim light in a ten foot radius when in darkness
The character attuned to this item is granted immunity from all effects and damage for a predetermined spell of level one or lower, while wearing or touching the item
The magic item's weilder can use the object to cast a predetermined cantrip
The magic item and any of it's contents are invisible when worn
The magic item and any of it's contents are invisible when worn. The character attuned to the item can sense it's direction and exact distance from themselves
Adds one spell level to the "once a day" spell level pool
The magic item is an arcane focus for a predetermined class
The magic item is an arcane focus for the character attuned to it
Any spells the magic item is capable of being used to cast also become known spells to the character attuned to this item, so long as they are a spell caster and so long as they are attuned to it.
The magic items appears to be a really valuable object
The magic item appears to be a mundane or worthless object
The character attuned to this item can use a bonus action to activate or deactivate persistant properties of the magic item
The character attuned to this item is granted advantage to a predetermined skill or ability check when opposing a predetermined race or creature type, while wearing or touching the item

attribute name: Two spell levels once a day
description: Adds two spell level to the "once a day" spell level pool

attribute name: One spell level thrice a day
description: Adds one spell level to the "three times a day" spell level pool
The magic item's weilder can use the object to cast one of three predetermined cantrips
This magic item grants the weilder +1 to their attacks and damage rolls when using this item as the weapon
This magic item grants the weilder +1 to their AC when worn
This magic item grants the weilder +1 to the spell attach and damage rolls when using this item as an arcane focus
The magic item can fly with a fly speed of 30'
The magic item adds 1d6 healing to healing spells cast when the character attuned to the item uses the item as an arcane focus
Critical hits against the wearer of this item count as normal hits
The wearer is stabilized if their health drops to or below zero
When the character attuned to this item uses a workweek of downtime to craft, an additional workweek's of production may be added
The magic item now contains a 64 cubic foot extra dimensional space
The character attuned to this item gains advantage on a predetermined skill or ability check

This item grants an additional 60' of darkvision when used
This item allows the user to use a bonus action to see a chosen target up to 60' away as if they are right in front of it.
This item grants advantage on perception checks that rely on a sense of smell
This item grants advantage on perception checks that rely on a sense of hearing

This magic item grants the weilder +3 to their attacks and damage rolls when using this item as the weapon
This magic item grants the weilder +3 to their AC when worn

This magic item has a sentience and can communicate with the character that is attuned to it via a telepathic bond. It has an Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma of 12 and is proficient in Wisdom saving throws. The item also has blindsight for a 10' radius. This item can take "Use magic item" action to use it's own properties on the attuned character's turn.
This magic item gains a speed of 30 and can take appropriate physical actions based on it's form. If the item is not sentient, then the character attuned to it may use their bonus action to direct it
The character attuned to this item gains +2 to their Intelligence and their maximum is increased by 2.
The character attuned to this item gains +2 to their Strength and their maximum is increased by 2.
